reviews.review_msg: Extremely condescending to students, very intimidating & uncomfortable to be around. Made several fat shaming comments throughout the semester on famous biologists, expects students to memorize 25 min presentations and midterm is final because its at the end of the semester but it was fair, doesn't care about students suffering with anxiety, AVOID

Dr. Beh is not just one of the best profs Ive ever had, he is also one of the greatest people Ive had the pleasure of meeting. He is a phenomenal speaker, a tremendous teacher, and an unbelievable mentor. Class is fun, and he tells you what will be on the exam. Just read the papers and learn to understand them, and you will be fine!

I have had Dr.Beh for both 331 and 430 now, and he is one of my favourite profs. I enjoyed 430 because he is a great speaker and gets you engaged in the topic, and the class size is so much smaller than 331, you really get to know him. Great Prof... for 331 it is incredibly difficult but that's not really him, that's just the nature of the course.
Very good speaker who made attending lectures fun. Has high expectation of his students so work hard, read the papers and participate a lot.
